name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MinimaList: Minimal New Tab Todo List

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and Elegant todo list to replace your 'New Tab' page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A beautiful minimal Todo List New Tab for Chrome to help you keep track of your tasks and increase your productivity.

Toggle recurring tasks
Edit current tasks
Upload a background image of your own liking
Switch between light mode and dark mode 
Your privacy is protected as no data will be sent to cloud storage
